analysis.key_quote: The proposed rule will result in the politicization of the scientific review process at NIH, seriously disrupting the scientific process and the critical role NIH provides in developing and distributing life-saving biomedical discoveries.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the politicization of the scientific review process and the potential negative impact on biomedical research, which aligns with the themes of politicization and scientific integrity.
